list.title: Question 1
list.content:
Jeremy invests $$8000$ into a savings account that pays an annual
interest rate of $5.5$ %, compounded
annually.


Write down a formula which calculates that total value of the
investment after $n$ years. [2]



Calculate the amount of money in the savings account after:


$1$ year;


$3$ years. [2]





Jeremy wants to use the money to put down a $$10000$
deposit on an apartment. Determine if Jeremy will be able to do this
within a $5$-year timeframe.[2]
list.markScheme:
We have


![SkillUpp Image](https://assets.revisionvillage.com/public/question/29dc8a60-0190-46e1-8d7c-a827be9924b6/images/828dc7db-36fb-4e0e-b60e-5970709ce9e1/eaedd006beb5ba238d9ad76a3a6f6101e049be71.svg)


Hence, using the compound interest formula, we have
$$$FV​=PV(1+100kr​)kn=8000(1+100×15.5​)1×n=8000(1+0.055)n​(1)​$$$




Substituting $n=1$ in the formula $(1)$, we get
$$$FV​=8000(1+0.055)=$8440​​$$$


Substituting $n=3$ in the formula $(1)$, we get
$$$FV​=8000(1+0.055)3≈$9390​​$$$




Substituting $n=5$ in the formula $(1)$, we obtain
$$$FV​=8000(1+0.055)5≈$10456​$$$
$Yes, Jeremy will be able to do this within a 5-year timeframe.​$

Using the compound interest formula, we have
$$$FV​=7380(1+100×124.7​)12×8=$10740.69​​(M1)A1​$$$

$$$A1$$$

list.content:
Michael buys a second hand Tesla car for $$18000$. The

year.


Find the total amount the car will depreciate after 5 years, giving

The price of a different used car depreciates by $5%$ each year.

Find the value reduction of this car after $4$ years as a
percentage, when compared to the original purchase price.
[3]
list.markScheme:
We have


![SkillUpp Image](https://assets.revisionvillage.com/public/question/1ef72e0b-6daf-49bf-86a3-f321048cbc21/images/8ad5fa87-b19d-4552-90d8-eab141f1d092/6462608efbf9ba0d371a0ca7fdfe6437d1874af0.svg)


Using the compound depreciation formula, we get
$$$FV​=PV(1−100r​)n=18000(1−10010​)5≈$10629​$$$
Hence, after $5$
years the car has depreciated by
$$$PV−FV​=18000−10629=$7371​​$$$

![SkillUpp Image](https://assets.revisionvillage.com/public/question/1ef72e0b-6daf-49bf-86a3-f321048cbc21/images/4f46d5f5-a0a5-46ed-962c-a2080abe4c9c/16c3205d28d13971f8ad1ff276a51f080dad38f6.svg)
